properties.name: appium-hub.stop-on-proxy-error
properties.description: Whether to terminate session if any error.

properties.name: appium-hub.browser-timeout
properties.description: Session command timeout, as a second.

properties.name: appium-hub.new-session-wait-timeout
properties.description: Timeout for waiting free node for new session create, as a ms

properties.name: appium-hub.clean-up-cycle
properties.description: Node check time for determine session idle, as a ms

properties.name: appium-hub.timeout
properties.description: Idle session timeout, as a second.

properties.name: appium-hub.node-polling
properties.description: Node check time for determine node reachability, as a ms.

properties.name: appium-hub.down-polling-limit
properties.description: Node check count for mark node unreachable.

properties.name: appium-hub.unregister-if-still-down-after
properties.description: Timeout for unregister unreachable nodes, as a ms.

properties.name: appium-hub.node-status-check-timeout
properties.description: Socket timeout for node polling, as a ms.

properties.name: appium-hub.throw-on-capability-not-present
properties.description: Whether to throw exception if capability not match.

properties.name: appium-hub.enable-controller
properties.description: Whether to enable appium hub controller.
